Reaching Osmania Medical College

- Train

The closest train station is at Hyderabad Deccan-HYB (Nampally) which is 2 kilometres away. It is considered the best to board or arrive from out state destination trains in Hyderabad. Other important railway stations in Hyderabad include Secunderabad/ Kachiguda/ Begumpet Railway stations.

- Flight

Rajiv Gandhi International Airport (ranked among the top airports of the world ) is located 23 kilometres away from Osmania Medical College. Car rental and Taxi services are available at the airport.



- Bus

Mahatma Gandhi Bus Station (the largest in Asia) located close to Koti is a major bus station, and it is a road transport gateway to the city. This bus station provides transport to all parts of the state and country.

The local city Bus terminus is located adjacent to the Mahatma Bus station, providing connectivity to all parts of the city.
